law.catch_line: Authorization for military personnel to carry arms when on state active duty.
law.text: Officers, warrant officers, and enlisted men of the Kentucky National Guard shall, while on state active duty, have the same right to carry arms and in the same manner as sheriffs and other peace officers.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 307, sec. 7, effective April 9, 1992. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 98, sec. 20. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2711a-233.
